author: Al Jazeera
title: Japan's coronavirus containment strategy faces breaking point
description: Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe announces more restrictions on cabinet meetings as Tokyo expands overseas travel ban.
content:
Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe and his deputy will no longer attend meetings together to cut exposure to the coronavirus, as pressure for a lockdown builds and a minister warned the country's containment strategy was stretched to the limit.
The decision … [+2997 chars]
